context_of_use: This use case allows admins to manage product-related tasks within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control product availability and pricing
description: Allows admins to create products, update product information and prices, and manage inventory levels.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to manage products.
postconditions: Products are created or updated successfully.
assumptions: Admin has access to the product management interface.
Admin is familiar with the product management processes.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the process for handling product creation errors.
main_flow: 1. Admin creates a new product → System saves the product details.
2. Admin updates product prices → System updates the pricing information.
3. Admin manages inventory levels → System adjusts the inventory accordingly.
